channel.title: Galkons Refractor client base question!
channel.description:
ALright, so i have galkons client and it has no class 8, 9 and others, i know because its a refractor, it has model loading preloading etc. How do i add things though? such as god swords and what not? Cause you need ints like on blurrs, u add the model, add the ints and boom, if you can't add ints on here then what do i do?
Thanks

item.title: Galkons Refractor client base question!
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

I thought the items where loaded through the cache ? It also depends on what cache its loading. Does its load all 474 items ?

Read full topic
